title: CGI video by Russian inventor viral as Israeli drones supplied to India
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
“यह वही ड्रोन है जिसे भारत इज़राइल से खरीद रहा है।इसे खरीदने का प्रयास चीन ने भी किया लेकिन भारत का विरोधी होने के कारण इज़राइल ने बेचने से साफ मना कर दिया|आप भी देखिए इस ड्रोन का कमाल (This is the same drone that India is purchasing from Israel. Even China tried to buy this (drone) but as it opposes India, Israel denied selling it to China. You also watch this amazing drone),” is a message currently viral on social media, accompanied with a CGI video of combat aircrafts and drones.

Several individual users have shared the 6:16 minutes clip.

Alt News found that the video has been floating on both Twitter and Facebook with the identical claim since last year.

The viral video carried the stamp – ‘Semenov Dahir Kurmanbievich’. When Alt News looked up the phrase on YouTube, we found that it was the name of a Russian inventor, Dahir Semenov. We discovered his YouTube channel where, in 2016, he had uploaded the same video which is currently viral on social media.

We also found his LinkedIn and Facebook profiles which said that he is a Russian citizen currently residing in Turkey.

Semenov is also a director of a technology company called Dahir Insaat Corporation, which provides clients with construction techniques. He made news in 2015 for designing an earthquake-proof bed.

In the aftermath of Pulwama attack, Israel offered “unconditional help” to India to tackle terrorism. Recently, the Indian government also approved 54 killer drones from Israel made for the Indian air force. However, the viral video is not representative of the India-Israel defence deal as it was a concept design uploaded by a Russian inventor.
